text: I highly recommend Pro-Teach Student Care! The educators are dedicated and caring, and the center is managed by a passionate and committed individual, Mrs. Seah. She provides helpful feedback on students' academic performance and behavior. I appreciate her patience and kindness. Will definitely refer my friends' children to this center for student care.

Pro teach Ang Mo Kio has got an excellent team of dedicated educators that show care and concern for their students. The centre is managed by Mrs Seah, a fine individual that is very passionate and committed to the cause. She constantly provides useful feedback to parents on the students academic performance and behaviour. A very patient and kind person. Will definitely recommend my friends children to the centre if student care is required.
Today I have just enrolled this student care, the classroom and common area is quite big for study and activities. We like it so much
Spelling, ting xie and homework taken care of. Tuition at no extra charge. Fetching from Mayflower Primary too.

Visited this student care in preparation for my P1 daughter. Found it adequate, but I'm looking for a more conducive and comfortable place for my daughter. This student care is just like another classroom. Seems quite cramped tooâ€¦
